page.title: 03TORRIDON SHOP
page.content: There is only one shop which sells a lot of things,some of which are;frozen food,fruit and vegetables,milk,bread, groceries,sweets;boots,jumpers,clothes cleaning materials,books,picture post cards and souvenirs.It is also a{sub {Post office}selling stamps and postal orders.It does not do banking nor Giro Bank nor savings. It does pay pensions and family allowance and pays Giro cheques.There is a{Post box}at the shop with one am collection.The half day is on a Thursday in winter,but in summer it stays open all day.It always {closes on Sunday.}Because there are so many tourists in summer there are more customers then than in winter when it is just the local people.It is a small {self service}type of shop with the goods priced on the shelves.It also sells wines and spirits,lemonade and cigarettes,and fishers can buy tackle.
